title: Greg and Stella Reveal the DICE Awards Nominees! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.12.23
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get Honey for free!

Greg is joined by Stella from IGN to announce the Dice Awards Nominees, talk more Ubisoft and Xbox Developer_Direct details, and a fun Marvel Snap update.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:05 - Housekeeping
A new episode of The Blessing Show is up right now on youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:35 - The DICE Award Nominees REVEALED
00:35:42 - Ubisoft’s CEO reportedly tells staff the onus is on them to reverse the company’s fortunes
00:38:58 - Xbox Germany says it will announce Forza and Redfall release dates in the Developer_Direct
00:45:29 - Xbox consoles are now ‘carbon aware’
00:48:12 - Marvel Snap’s PvP update is scheduled to launch in late January
00:50:18 - Saudi Arabia has increased its stake in Nintendo
00:53:13 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:27 - “If you could take your two favorite video games and combine them into a new one, what would the results be?” - Sean B
00:58:05 - Squad Up: PLayStation - SoulBlaster59
00:58:52 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
